Name: Celery Cocktail
Ingredients: 7.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Prepare garnish of salt rim & celery stick.
Review: Celery is usually only tasty when loaded with blue cheese. Vodka also seems to make it rather palatable.
History: Created by Andreas Tsanos at Momos, London, England in 2001.
Nutrition: One serving of Celery Cocktail contains 181 calories
